settings.region_explanation: Select the country from which you want to receive local news content and fact-checked information.
settings.content_language_explanation: Choose the language in which you want to read news and content. This allows you to consume information in your preferred language.

common.add_friends_from_stories: Add friends or find them from locations

common.confirm_logout_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
common.confirm_logout_description: Note that all your conversations will be deleted after logging out

common.download_media_permission: Permission is needed to download the image or video
common.go_to_location_to_post: You need to go to the location to post
common.spaces_description: Spaces provide a dynamic platform for real-time video calls, allowing you to create or join public discussions and share your unique perspectives. Engage in live conversations, connect with others, and explore a wide range of topics in an interactive environment.
common.spaces_public_info: When a space is public, anyone can join using a link or discover it via the app's public spaces list. Public spaces can be accessed by anyone, so ensure you are comfortable with your content being widely available.
common.spaces_invite_info: You can easily invite specific friends to join your space using a private invitation link. This feature allows for more focused and intimate discussions with people you choose to include.
common.what_to_talk_about: What do you want to talk about?
common.failed_to_start_live_stream: Failed to start live stream, please try again later.
common.location_permission_needed: Location permission is required to get location information.
common.location_check_failed_gps: Unfortunately, the address check failed, please check your GPS.
common.unfiltered_verified_info: Get unfiltered, verified information in real time
common.recheck_description: Factcheck photo, text or social media link
common.source_info_card_description: When sharing a link, we automatically summarize the content and fact-check the information linked to it
common.location_check_failed_gps_description: Unfortunately, location cannot be detected, please check your GPS.
common.permission_needed_for_photo_and_video: Permission needed for photo and video
common.forced_logout_description: ხომ არ ცადეთ სხვა ტელეფონით შესვლა?
common.overview_description: When you see a fact-check or summary, we analyze the content of web pages, social media posts, and other sources to confirm factual accuracy. Our system looks for relevant references across multiple websites to evaluate statements and provide you with a comprehensive assessment.
common.how_we_score_description_1: Our factual accuracy score ranges from 0 to 1, representing how accurate a statement is based on evidence found across the internet. The higher the score, the more factually accurate the statement.
common.how_we_score_description_2: Each reference is classified as either 'supporting' or 'non-supporting' of the statement being checked. These references directly influence the final factual accuracy assessment.
common.process_step_1: We analyze the full textual content of the material
common.process_step_2: Our system performs a deep search for all mentioned statements
common.process_step_3: We find relevant references from multiple websites
common.process_step_4: Sources are evaluated as supporting or non-supporting
common.process_step_5: We provide a summary, a factual accuracy score, and original sources
common.limitations_description: While our fact-checking system is comprehensive, it has limitations. Results depend on available online information, and some topics may have limited or conflicting sources. We recommend reviewing the provided sources to make your own assessment.

errors.general_error: An error occurred. Please try again
errors.failed_clipboard_image: Failed to get image from clipboard
errors.failed_paste_image: Failed to paste image from clipboard
errors.camera_permission_required: Permission to access camera roll is required
errors.camera_permission_denied: Permission to access camera roll was denied. Please enable it in your system settings
